name: open-with-cursor
title: Open with Cursor
description: Open files and folders from Finder in Cursor editor with a single command
author: sincethestudy

commands.name: open-with-cursor
commands.title: Open with Cursor
commands.subtitle: Open in Cursor
commands.description: Open the selected file or folder from Finder in Cursor editor

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
